Aktivität Goals of the course auswählen
Explore a range of digital (and analogue) tools that are applicable to human factors research & cognitive science to boost quality of research.
Gain theoretical knowledge in the following areas (VL):
Understand how scientific knowledge is generated and used in the current publication system
Identify research ethics that apply uniquely to animal & human participants
Gain insights into what our current understanding of “good scientific practices” are
Learn how to benefit from and contribute to emerging/growing movements towards better research
Gain hands-on experience in the following methods (Seminar):
Version control and collaboration system (git, Github)
Data handling and sharing (Open Science Framework, Brain Imaging Data Structure)
